focus-on-really-important-things: HR-Focus on really important things. Leave the shipping to us!
imagine-how-much-time: HR-Imagine how much time you could save if your webshops's shipping tasks were handled by us with lower shipping rates. Fuvar.hu's mission is to find the best trasportation solution for the given task by competitively tendering empty cargo spaces.
can-we-help-you: HR-This is what we do best. Can we help you?
discount-price-description: HR-Within the country borders from as low as HUF 750
insurance-description: HR-In all cases, the trasnported items are insured.
cash-on-delivery-management-description: HR-You will receive your money within 72 hours of collecting the cash on delivery.
simple-integration-description: HR-Transferring your delivery needs can be easily integrated into any web shop engine. We also provide technical assistance to accomplish all of this.
user-friendly-administration-interface-d: HR-Track your packages. Of course, tracking is also available for your clients.
transparent-invoicing-description: HR-We issue one itemized invoice per month for all your shipping assignment.
enter-your-contact-information: HR-Enter your contact information and our colleague will contact you shortly.
partners-description: HR-You can choose from following service providers for each of your shipping assignments. (Of course, you need to sign a contract only with us)
